form.label: TrackMe - Data sampling and events formats recognition audit

panel.title: Number of monitored and active data sources during the last 24 hours

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring where data_monitored_state="enabled" | eval keyid = _key | where data_last_time_seen>relative_time(now(), "-24h") | stats dc(keyid) as dcount

panel.title: Number of Data sampling entities in the processed collection

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_sampling | eval keyid = _key | lookup trackme_data_source_monitoring data_name OUTPUT data_monitored_state | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | stats dc(keyid) as dcount

table.title: Data sources and data sampling status table - this is the consolidated view from the data source collection as presented within the UI, a value of 0 indicates no anomalies, while a value of 1 indicates anomalies detected by the data sampling engine

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring where data_monitored_state="enabled" | eval keyid=_key | search isAnomaly=$tk_is_anomaly$ | fields keyid, data_name, data_sample_lastrun, isAnomaly | eval data_sample_lastrun=if(data_sample_lastrun!=0, strftime(data_sample_lastrun, "%c"), "N/A (no successful run yet)")

| inputlookup trackme_data_sampling | eval keyid=_key | lookup trackme_data_source_monitoring data_name OUTPUT data_monitored_state | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | fillnull value="Unknown" data_sample_feature, data_sample_anomaly_reason, data_sample_anomaly_detected | stats c by data_sample_feature | fields data_sample_feature | sort 0 data_sample_feature

| inputlookup trackme_data_sampling | eval keyid=_key | lookup trackme_data_source_monitoring data_name OUTPUT data_monitored_state | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | fillnull value="Unknown" data_sample_feature, data_sample_anomaly_reason, data_sample_anomaly_detected | search data_sample_feature="$data_sample_feature$" | stats c by data_sample_anomaly_reason | fields data_sample_anomaly_reason | sort 0 data_sample_anomaly_reason

table.title: Data sampling records details - this is the raw view from the collection trackme_data_sampling, except the raw events samples (fields raw_sample and latest_raw)

search.query: | inputlookup trackme_data_sampling | eval keyid=_key | lookup trackme_data_source_monitoring data_name OUTPUT data_monitored_state | where data_monitored_state="enabled" | fillnull value="Unknown" data_sample_feature, data_sample_anomaly_reason, data_sample_anomaly_detected | search data_sample_feature="$data_sample_feature$" data_sample_anomaly_reason="$data_sample_anomaly_reason$" data_sample_anomaly_detected=$tk_is_anomaly$ | fields keyid, data_name, * | fields - raw_* | fields keyid, data_name, data_sample_anomaly_detected, data_sample_anomaly_reason, data_sample_feature, *

table.title: Tracker scheduler execution metrics - this view exposes some key information from the scheduling perspective such maximal number of entities that are to be processed in a single execution

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler earliest=-4h latest=now status="success" trackme app="trackme" savedsearch_name="TrackMe - Data sampling and format detection tracker" | stats avg(run_time) AS avg_run_time, max(run_time) AS max_run_time, latest(run_time) AS latest_run_time, latest(result_count) as last_processed_no_entities by savedsearch_name | foreach avg_run_time max_run_time latest_run_time [ eval <<FIELD>> = round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | appendcols [ | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring where data_monitored_state="enabled" | stats count as total_entities ] | eval potential_rate_sec=round(latest_run_time/last_processed_no_entities, 2) | eval max_accepted_run_time_sec=`trackme_data_sampling_max_allowed_runtime_sec` | eval max_entities_to_process=round(max_accepted_run_time_sec/potential_rate_sec, 0)

table.title: Scheduler executions over time - this reports the details over time from the scheduling point of view, a key informatom is the number of entities that were processed during the execution of the tracker

search.query: index=_internal sourcetype=scheduler earliest=-4h latest=now status="success" trackme app="trackme" savedsearch_name="TrackMe - Data sampling and format detection tracker" | stats latest(run_time) AS run_time, latest(result_count) as last_processed_no_entities by _time, savedsearch_name | eval run_time = round(run_time, 2) | appendcols [ | inputlookup trackme_data_source_monitoring where data_monitored_state="enabled" | stats count as total_entities ] | filldown total_entities | eval potential_rate_sec=round(latest_run_time/last_processed_no_entities, 2) | eval max_accepted_run_time_sec=`trackme_data_sampling_max_allowed_runtime_sec` | eval max_entities_to_process=round(max_accepted_run_time_sec/potential_rate_sec, 0) | sort - limit=0 _time
